snippet: With the spinoff of Time Inc., Time Warner has become an example of the media industry’s shift away from rapid acquisition and growth.
abstract: Time Warner confirms that it will spin off its Time Inc magazine division, completing conglomerate's multi-year evolution into a pure cable television and movie production company; transformation is brainchild of chief executive Jeffrey L Bewkes and highlights his confidence in its high-margin cable channels; move is also an example of a philosophical shift in the media industry away from rapid acquisition and growth.
lead_paragraph: With the spinoff of Time Inc., Time Warner has become an example of the media industry’s shift away from rapid acquisition and growth.

headline.seo: Time Warner’s Spinoff Plan Returns to Basics
headline.main: In a Spinoff of Time Inc., Evolution Is Complete
headline.print_headline: In a Spinoff Of Time Inc., Evolution Is Complete
